ap:Query.ap:Filter: (managedObjectId='pvm:0a121' AND (messageId='BX_INSTANCE_PROCESS*' OR messageId='BX_INSTANCE_SUBPROCESS*' OR messageId='com.tibco.bx*')) OR (managedObjectId='pvm:0a121' AND managedObjectType <> '*Event' AND managedObjectType <> '*Gateway' AND managedObjectType <> 'userTask') OR (messageCategory='WORK_ITEM' AND parentObjectId='pvm:0a121')
